title: D.I.Y. Dumpling Party
description: A 4-hour celebration of lunar new year with brunch and performance. We will also try pull out one long longevity noodle.

items.title: Snake cucumbers
items.description: A refreshing, crunchy, cucumber sliced into a snake. It swims in a tangy yuzu soy sauce, with a kick of Sichuan peppercorn and sesame oil.

items.title: Wudang West Longevity Tea Blend (Ripe Puerh)
items.description: A high grade, old tree, artisanal blend of Xiang Tu ripe puerh (2016) and 7572 ginseng aroma (2000) from Kunming, Yunnan;  Custom pressed for Wudang West

items.title: 豆豆濃濃 / Coco Mung Milk
items.description: Richly flavored toasted mung beans blended with coconut milk and condensed coconut milk.  Served cold.

items.title: 翠珍 / Verdant Treasure
items.description: Asian aromatic greens, savory shiitake, and luxurious notes of truffle.  Chrysanthemum greens, Chinese chives, Marinated Shiitake, Sprouted Silken Tofu, & French Summer Truffle Salt. (Also w/ salt, chinese mushroom bouillon, potato starch, sesame oil, and corn oil)

items.title: Impossible Scallion
items.description: Fresh, vegan take on beloved classic! Impossible pork and green onions are blended with a mushroom-based 'oyster' sauce for a touch of sweetness. A slow-infused scallion oil made with shallots, star anise, ginger, and sichuan peppercorn brings it all home to mouth-watering perfection.

items.title: Beyond Carrots
items.description: Shredded carrots and plant-based beef come together in this vegan reimagining of a regional favorite. The secret ingredient here is a soy-based, Korean-style BBQ sauce, brightened by a handful of finely chopped cilantro.

items.title: 差點外公炸醬 / Almost Grandpa's Zhajiang Sauce
items.description: Traditional Taiwanese-style zhajiang sauce loaded with garlic, scallion, and fermented soy bean paste. Nontraditionally blended with tahini and then topped with toasted walnuts, daikon cress, edamame, and Tajine.

items.title: Sichuan Chili Oil
items.description: A spicy, aromatic oil made with Sichuan peppercorn, star anise, and dried chilis.  It is infused with garlic, ginger, and scallion.

items.title: Black Vinegar
items.description: A rich, aged vinegar made from fermented rice.  It is sweetened with a touch of sugar and seasoned with a hint of salt.
